body.p: Alka – Seltzer Comic: No Sunday Headaches Spoil Our Day Since Alka-Seltzer Came Our Way Headache Don’t let HEADACHE, Acid Indigestion, Neuralgia, Muscular, Rheunatie, Sciatic Pains, rob you of healthful recreation. Take Alka-Seltzer. Find out for yourself how quickly it will relieve your every-day ailments/ Alka-Seltzer relieves pain because it contains an analgesia (acetyl-salicylate). Alka-Seltzer’s vegetable and mineral alkalizes help to neutralize excess stomach acids. At year drug store, at the soda fountain, and in 30 cents and 60 cents packages for home use. Be Wise- Alkalize!
